name: unreconciled
content:
unreconciled adjective
(DISAGREEMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unreconciled people or groups cannot agree with each other and therefore do not have a friendly relationship: Sectarian groups in the country remain unreconciled.
unable to accept something: unreconciled to Elements within the party have remained unreconciled to the deal.
More examplesFewer examplesAt the time, they were unreconciled following a bitter argument. Both remain utterly unreconciled in their longer-term view of the region's future.The opposition remains unreconciled to losing the past election.
